name: Transverse
dostring: Transverse loop sweeping through aorta

name: Proximal
dostring:
Show liver, celiac vessels, and spine.
Measure the AP diameter.
Measure from outer wall to outer wall
optimize: Disperse bowel gas with gentle pressure

name: Mid
dostring:
Show liver, celiac vessels, and spine.
Measure the AP diameter.
Measure from outer wall to outer wall
optimize: Disperse bowel gas with gentle pressure

name: Distal
dostring:
Show liver, celiac vessels, and spine.
Measure the AP diameter.
Measure from outer wall to outer wall
optimize: Disperse bowel gas with gentle pressure

name: Bifurcation
dostring:
Measure the AP diameter.
Measure from outer wall to outer wall

name: Sagittal
dostring:
Measure the AP diameter.
Measure from outer wall to outer wall.
Must show celiac artery and SMA

name: Sagittal Measurement
dostring:
Sagittal frame of the Aorta.
Measure outer-to-outer 2cm distal to the SMA.

name: Parasternal Long
dostring:
Must show descending thoracic aorta.
Display marker must be on the left of the screen.
Probe marker must be directed towards the hip.
measure:
Ejection fraction:
- Normal: 55-65%
- Mildly depressed
- Moderately depressed
- Severely depressed
- Hyperdynamic

name: Parasternal Short
dostring:
Must show all 3 levels: papillary muscles, aortic valve and mitral valve.
- Need not be in a single loop.

name: Apical Four Chamber
optimize: Interventricular septum should be vertically aligned.
measure: Normal right ventricle should be less than 0.6 of the left ventricle.

name: Common Femoral Vein
dostring: Include from the saphenofemoral junction.

name: Superficial Femoral Vein
dostring: Show compression every 1-2cm from proximal thigh to the adductor canal.

name: Popliteal Vein
dostring: Include the popliteal vein throught the bifurcation with trifurcation.

name: RUQ
dostring: Show lung - diaphragm - liver - Morison's pouch - cuadal tip of the liver - interior pole of the kidney - and spine.

name: LUQ
dostring: Slide the following structures lung - diaphragm - spleen - caudal tip of the spleen - inferior renal pole.

name: Suprapubic Sag.
dostring:
Show portal vein.
Show gallbladder neck.

name: Lung Right
dostring: Show 3 intercostal spaces

name: Lung Left
dostring: Show 2 intercostal spaces

name: Sagittal
dostring: Fan through the gallbladder

name: Transverse
dostring: Fan through the gallbladder

name: Anterior Wall
dostring: Measure the anterior wall of the gallbladder.

name: Common Bile Duct
dostring:
Measure the CBD above the portal vein.
Inner wall to inner wall proximal to the hepatic artery.

name: Heart
dostring: Assess heart rate, EF, and contractility
measure:
Ejection fraction:
- Normal: 55-65%
- Mildly depressed
- Moderately depressed
- Severely depressed
- Hyperdynamic

name: IVC
dostring: Assess vena cava responsiveness with respiration

name: Morrison's Pouch
dostring: Assess Morison's pouch for potential internal bleeding

name: Aorta
dostring: Assess aorta for potential ruptured abdominal aortic aneurysm

name: Pulmonary
dostring: Assess lungs for potential tension pneumothorax

name: IVC Diameter
dostring:
Measure perpandicular to flow.
Measure inner wall to inner wall.

name: Respiratory Variation
dostring: Measure IVC diameter with inspiration and expiration.
optimize: Modify gain to obtain crisp white IVC walls.
measure:
Collapsability index (CI) = IVC max - IVC min / IVC max
Check:
CI < 50% = Volume responsive.

name: Uterus Sagittal
dostring:
Fan from one edge of uterus to the other.
Check number of gestations.
Look for extrauterine gestation
Confirm IUP (yolk sac present?).
Gestational sac/Double Decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.

name: Uterus Transverse
dostring:
Fan from one edge of uterus to the other.
Check number of gestations.
Extrauterine gestation
Confirm IUP (yolk sac present?).
Gestational sac/Double Decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.

name: EMM
dostring: Measure from gestational sac to outer edge of the myometrium.

name: Fetal Heart Rate
dostring:
Use M-mode.
Select peaks two beats apart.
Avoid pulse wave doppler
Use zoom.

name: Uterus Sagittal
dostring:
Fan from one edge of uterus to the other.
Check number of gestations.
Extrauterine gestation
Confirm IUP (yolk sac present?).
Gestational sac/Double Decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.

name: Uterus Transverse
dostring:
Fan from one edge of uterus to the other.
Check number of gestations.
Extrauterine gestation
Confirm IUP (yolk sac present?).
Gestational sac/Double Decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.

name: Biparietal Diameter
dostring: Measure from outer table to inner table perpandicular to the falx cerebri

name: Head Circumference
dostring: Place measurement markers at both ends of the falx cerebri

name: Fetal Heart Rate
dostring:
Use M-mode.
Select peaks two beats apart.
Avoid pulse wave doppler
Use zoom.

name: Transverse Plane
dostring: Fan through the transverse view of the eye.
optimize: Increase gain to assess for hemorrhage and detachment.

name: Transverse ONSD
dostring:
Measure 3mm behind retina.
Measure perpendicular to axis of ONSD.
measure:
Average the value obtained with the sagittal ONSD.
Normal ONSD: <5mm.
Gray zone = 5-6mm.
Increased ICP: >6mm.

name: Sagittal Plane
dostring: Fan through the saggital view of the eye.
optimize: Increase gain to assess for hemorrhage and detachment.

name: Sagittal ONSD
dostring:
Measure 3mm behind retina.
Measure perpendicular to axis of ONSD.
measure:
Average the value obtained with the sagittal ONSD.
Normal ONSD: <5mm.
Gray zone = 5-6mm.
Increased ICP: >6mm.

name: Sagittal
dostring: Fan edge to edge.
optimize: Adjust depth and use large amount of gel

name: Measurement
dostring: Measure the kidney in two planes.

name: Transverse
dostring:
Fan edge to edge.
Optimize width.

name: Transverse
measure: Measure in two planes: anterior-posterior and right-left (plus)

name: Sagittal
dostring:
Perform a "mow the lawn" technique of the affected area.
Include a normal section

name: Transverse
dostring:
Perform a "mow the lawn" technique of the affected area.
Include a normal section

name: Abnormal Trans.
dostring:
Sagittal view of the abnormal soft tissue/MSK.
Mowing the lawn technique

name: Abnormal Sag.
dostring:
Transverse view of the abnormal soft tissue/MSK.
Mowing the lawn technique

name: Fluid Collection
measure: Measure size (length + height) and depth of fluid collection

name: Anterior R+L
dostring: Start at the midclavicular line and slide inferiorly.
measure:
Assess for pneumothorax = 3-4cm
Else:
Minimum depth = 15cm.
Acute interstitial syndrome = at least 3 B-lines in 2 rib spaces on both sides of the chest

name: Lateral R+L
dostring: Start at the midaxillary line and slide inferiorly.
measure:
Assess for pneumothorax = 3-4cm
Else:
Minimum depth = 15cm.
Minimum depth of 15cm to assess for B lines.
Acute interstitial syndrome = at least 3 B-lines in 2 rib spaces on both sides of the chest

name: Posterior R+L
dostring:
Performed on posterior aspect of the thorax.
May be combined with CVP/diaphragm.
measure:
Assess for pneumothorax = 3-4cm
Acute interstitial syndrome = at least 3 B-lines in 2 rib spaces on both sides of the chest

name: Diaphragm R+L
dostring:
Must show spine
Check: Pleural effusion = positive spine sign, loss of pleural image, and positive curtain sign
